m_szDocTitle: Pre-Market: US Durable Goods Send Global Stocks Higher; Facebook Acquires Oculus VR | Markets | Minyanville's Wall Street
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Pre-Market: US Durable Goods Send Global Stocks Higher; Facebook Acquires Oculus VR By Alex Brokaw Mar 26, 2014 9:16 am Shares of King Entertainment, makers of the hit game "Candy Crush Saga," begin trading today. Stay Connected Stock futures pointed toward a higher open on Monday. Before the opening bell, Dow Jones ( INDEXDJX:.DJI ) futures rose Â 0.43% to 16,368. Futures on the S&P 500 (INDEXSP:.INX) were up 0.38% to 1,866.30. Nasdaq ( INDEXNASDAQ:.IXIC ) futures moved higher, rising 0.50% to 3,642.00.
